as.leap

Class LCAnalytics

  • java.lang.Object
    • as.leap.LCAnalytics

  • public final class LCAnalytics
extends java.lang.Object
    The LCAnalytics class provides an interface to LC's logging and analytics backend. Methods will return immediately and cache requests. That is, the request will be sent immediately if possible or the next time a network connection is available otherwise.

      • logEvent

        public static void logEvent(java.lang.String eventId)
        Tracks the occurrence of a custom event. Parse will store a data point at the time of invocation with the given event name.
        Parameters:
        eventId - The eventId of the custom event to report to LC as having happened.

      • logEvent

        public static void logEvent(java.lang.String eventId,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> dimensions)
        Tracks the occurrence of a custom event. Parse will store a data point at the time of invocation with the given event name.
        Parameters:
        eventId - The eventId of the custom event to report to LC as having happened.
        dimensions - The dictionary of information by which to segment this event.

      • logEvent

        public static void logEvent(java.lang.String eventId,
                            long eventCount,
                            java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> dimensions)
        Tracks the occurrence of a custom event. Parse will store a data point at the time of invocation with the given event name.
        Parameters:
        eventId - The eventId of the custom event to report to LC as having happened.
        eventCount - The count of the custom event had happened.
        dimensions - The dictionary of information by which to segment this event.
